website_summaries.verdict: This set of cards provides the fun of a traditional Monopoly game when you don't have several hours to play.
pros: As much fun as the familiar favorite board game, but not as complicated and more portable
Winning takes a combination of strategy and luck
cons: This card game is better for older children who have learned strategy – may be over the head of younger children

website_summaries.verdict: If classic Monopoly takes too long to play, Monopoly Deal is fun and fast-paced.
pros: Faster paced and simpler version of classic Monopoly game designed for ages 8 and up
Can play with anywhere from two to six players
Games can be played in as little as 15 minutes
Enjoyable for people who want to play multiple times
Attempt to collect three related properties to win the game
cons: Rules may be too complex for some people to pick up when in a hurry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I suggest teaching Monopoly Deal to a new group of people, they expect it to be similar to the board game. But it's definitely not! This card game is awesome. It requires a bit of strategy and a bit of luck. It's fast-paced and sometimes frustrating, but it's always a good time. Super high replayability so it never gets stale or boring like its board game predecessor. Overall, five stars. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen R.

customer_reviews.title: Great game - bad deck.
customer_reviews.text: This was our 3rd Monopoly Deal deck...my family and I play it often and the cards have wear down over time. The other two decks we had were nice and thick. This deck was much thinner and you can see through the cards pretty easily if the sun, or bright light, is at someone's back. I would recommend spending the extra $1 or 2 for the thicker decks. The game itself is 5 stars...just not this particular deck.
customer_reviews.author: Cat_Turned_Blue

customer_reviews.title: Addicting game!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have gotten hooked on this game. It involves strategic thinking but is pretty simple too. True to what it says, one game can played in 15 minutes or less. It's ideal for 2-3 players. I don't think it would be as much fun once you go beyond 4 but I haven't played with more than 3 yet so I wouldn't really know. I only gave it 4 stars because there are some situations that come up where they don't have rules to explain what is allowable or not. We've had to make up several house rules to keep things fair and consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Weston Belkot

customer_reviews.title: My family love this game
customer_reviews.text: My family love this game. my 5 year old can now play it, too so it's fun for the whole family. The great thing is that id does not take ages like the real Monopoly. The rules are easy to understand and it's great for 2 to 5 people (ideal 3 or 4).
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Green box version of game is amazing - Amazon sent blue box version which is awful
customer_reviews.text: Green box version of this game gets 5 stars. It is great and all 4 of my kids ages 4-14 loved playing it and so do adults. However Amazon sent me the blue box version twice. The blue box version is much harder to play and the graphics are awful. VERY DISAPPOINTED IN AMAZON. There are two listings for this: one for this green box version for a higher price and one for the blue box version at a lower price. Apparently Amazon is only sending the blue box version.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: My family LOVES this game. I mean my family of over 40 people young and old. We all have this game and always play it when we travel to see each other. We even took it to our trip to Hawaii (photo) and played it in the evenings after dinner. So easy to learn, HIGHLY recommended this game.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Saari

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game - Very easy to play and teach
customer_reviews.text: I've always said if Monopoly ruins friendships, this will test them. A ton of fun, very easy to pick up and teach a great "gateway" game if you want to introduce people into deck building games (Sushi Go, Love Letter are also great). It does play in 15 minutes once you've played it for a number of hands and know what you are doing. Quick tip - 2 players play till 4 or 5 Monopoly's. It is WELL worth the $4-$6 you will play. I've played it hundreds of times of the years, bought it for friends and family. There is a reason that it has such good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: N. A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: The game was not all there. I did Not get the full game....
customer_reviews.text: When I bought the Monopoly Card Game it was because friends had it and had taught us to play it. We thought it would be a great game to have in our camper. So here it is March and pulled it out to play for the very first time. Tore the wipers off had our friends here to play. When we did things started to look funny. There was not a set of any of the properties. We got things like 2 electric companies but no water works, or 4 railroad cards but 2 different railroads not 4. And so on. Please advise what can be done about the problem. Check the pictures I sent. Thank You, Sue Ruggles
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ruggles

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item thinking I would receive the item shown in the descriptions, however, I received the card game that was prior to this version. Furthermore, when I received it, the item was opened, torn, scratched, and dented. Pretty tilting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prepare for Alimony
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of THE most enjoyable card games ever! I bought 2 decks, because 1 isn't enough for 4+ players (we slightly modify the rules with identical properties, etc). Very fast to pick up, fun strategies can be used, some very powerful cards to "ruin" friendships and marriages . . . :) Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K. C. Saechao

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Have time to kill on a plane? Want to lose some friends? Want to expose the poor? Want to destroy the rich? Want to be the best, the best ther ever was? This game is definitely your go to. Quick and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jiovany

customer_reviews.title: Monopoly for grown ups!
customer_reviews.text: Came with two packs of 55 cards that were sealed. The cards are of good quality and should last for a while. There is an instruction page with pictures that is helpful. There are also 4 rule summary cards so players can refer during the game. I think it's a great take on the traditional monopoly game we grew up playing and is lot easier to carry around. You could call this the monopoly for adults. Cards have diff colours so it's easy to differentiate them. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: J.C John

customer_reviews.title: Faster than Monopoly, but Just as Fun
customer_reviews.text: A friend brought Monopoly Deal over for a couple's game and we had such a great time, I immediately ordered it. I love Monopoly, but I rarely have time to play an epic board game. This card game version had all the fun of the regular game and took waaaay less time. It took me a bit to get the hang of it (discard 3, draw 2, cards in play vs cards in hand), but my husband was a master after two hands. I like that the game can be played with two players, so the husband and I can play on our own sometimes. There are not a lot of games that are as fun with two.
customer_reviews.author: The Southern Review

customer_reviews.title: Best Travel Sized Game
customer_reviews.text: LIKE - I love how affordable, travel-friendly, and printing design DISLIKE - You might need to buy like a sturdier box than the card box that it comes with. If you love the print on the card, then consider laminating the card to keep it more "minty condition." I wish these cards are water proof : < I guess they will have to charge more for that.
customer_reviews.author: AnhAnh

customer_reviews.title: Short rounds and entertaining!!!
customer_reviews.text: Initially we tried to play this game and for the first couple minutes thought about returning it. It seemed very daunting. After about 5 minutes of playing, we started to get the hang of it and it is her favorite game now! We play it every night and it keeps us extra family time together, who doesn't need that? It is our new favorite game and will travel well. Each round lasts only around 15 minutes, it's not an all-night thing like the original Monopoly which drives me nuts with boredom and monotony. Great for the whole fam, my 13 and 10 year old love it! Dont hesitate to buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic221979

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this game! The directions basically tell you it’s confusing and to just play a hand to figure it out. So at least the game acknowledges that. That’s what we had to do. We played our first round with our hands showing so we could all work together to figure it out. It’s a great 2 player game. It does take some strategy and skill. I feel 10+ is probably the best age. My husband and I love to play it after I’m our daughter goes to bed to just unwind and spend time together. We didn’t expect to love it this much! Will be buying for every couple we know for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: HeartReviews

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Game We Own!
customer_reviews.text: I thought we were crazy about the Monopoly board games and all the different variations, but after buying this version, we may never go back. No issues with messing deals and backstabbing tactics and made up rules to get in the way of just playing a GREAT game of Monopoly. Wish we had known about it sooner. It's portable, I bought 2 so far and we've been playing it multiple times every day. I will by more for traveling and gifts and definitely recommend this product/game to EVERYONE wanting to have FUN.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Chatters

customer_reviews.title: DEAL BREAKER
customer_reviews.text: This monopoly card game is literally the best game ever! One of my clients recommended it and I’m SOOOOO glad that I bought it. I play it with my parents and sister and we all absolutely love it, we really get into it and have a real blast. What I love about it is that it’s so easy to learn, and DOSNT take long to play at all. We play about three rounds at a time to see who wins and only takes about 15 minutes a round. Once you get the hang of it you will be craving to play, this game really brings my family together and I’m very grateful for that.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Emerald

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Whitney Simmons! Way different than the board game!!
customer_reviews.text: I heard about this card game from my favorite Youtuber, Whitney Simmons, in one of her monthly favorites videos and I had to get it to try it! My boyfriend and I play a lot of quick card games and I wasn't sure how we were going to like it and how similar or dissimilar it was going to be compared to the original board game. It takes some time to learn all the rules and play it correctly but it is pretty easy to pick up! Within one night, we pretty much mastered how to play and now this is my boyfriend's favorite card game we have! Very fun and quick games to keep us entertained!
customer_reviews.author: KatieB

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite game - as long as it’s the old version.
customer_reviews.text: We love this game and and buy several at a time to give as gifts. Our entire family, including the kids plays. We like the one with green cover and the original Monopoly look. The new one in the white box is hard to read, not colorful, and we stopped gifting it. Somehow, the new design took some of the fun away from the game. I hope Parker Brothers is paying attention.
customer_reviews.author: TwinkiesMommy

customer_reviews.title: So much fun all ages
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun to play. My son is 6 and cannot quite read all the details printed on the cards, but the colors make it easy to tell what the cards are. It took him only a few times playing with us before he memorized what all the colors and everything meant without having to actually read it. We play this all the time and have so much fun. Can't go wrong, because it is an easy game to set up, doesn't take long to play and easy to put away. No excuse to not take a few minutes to play with your kids... or just adults!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!
customer_reviews.text: This game has become a bit of a family obsession! I gave this to my 8yo son for Christmas and we have played it every few days (multiple times each day) ever since. He loves it, his older cousins love it, his parents love it and even his grandparents love it! It truly appeals to all ages and is a great spinoff on Monopoly without having to spend tedious hours playing a single game. We are done typically in under 10 minutes and no one is ever ready to quit after one round. We will be giving this as birthday gifts to his friends moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: SmileyMom72

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Beware. They will bait you with the belief that you are buying the upgraded version as shown on the picture but they will switch the cheaper version. They claim it is the same game but it is not and the games are not priced the same. I have played both and highly recommend the upgraded (green deck). They sent me the cheaper deck and are requiring me to pay return postage even though they sent the wrong (much less expensive card deck). This is a scam!!! Note if zero stars were allowed that would be too many.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks !  Got the version I had requested
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered the Monopoly Deal green box/card version package and got exactly what I had requested, just right before they changed to the picture of the blue package. The new blue package version are harder to read cards, so I'm thankful. I'm not sure why it took three weeks shipment, especially for a small package. It must be third party order connection, but glad to finally got it.
customer_reviews.author: Tmundy

customer_reviews.title: I bring this everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS GAME!! I recently discovered it and I'm so glad I did. We all play this on game nights and it's so fun. Since it's a perfect size, I leave this in my purse and bring it with us for whenever we may be at a location for a long period of time. Just recently, we spent about 5 hours at the car dealership because we were buying a new car. In between waiting for all the paperwork, we whipped this out and started playing! I started telling other salesman about it too and they were going to get it also. This game is perfect for every occasion and especially for family game nights!
customer_reviews.author: G.G

customer_reviews.title: Bought one for all branches of the family
customer_reviews.text: This card game was recommended by a friend. While I still love to play Monopoly (I'm 68), I don't always enjoy sitting for hours to complete one game. This is a fun and quick way to enjoy the concept. An added bonus--doesn't require a lot of storage real estate. The rules seemed a little confusing but once we began play the 1st and 3rd graders had it down pat. (They had to keep reminding me of the details). If you like games, you'll love this one. Buy it. I bought one for our home and one for each adult child's family.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Turner

customer_reviews.title: I love this game! Perfect for everything
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so this game is suitable for all ages and for any kind of activity! Family time, game night, date with some wine or just with Netflix in background, really anything and everything ranging from picnics to a wedding. Bust these out and have a blast. Little Disclosure: I bought new but, I’m pretty confident mine was used because the package was all boggered and there’s obvious wear on it. I highly encourage anyone and everyone buy this. But I will make this one star if I find that any cards are missing. I’m honestly a little annoyed my purchase isn’t new “new”. Hope this helps haha!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: I’ve already played this many times and I’m buying another set!
customer_reviews.text: This game is AMAZING!! I’ve been playing it with my friends nonstop almost every night for the past 3 weeks since I was first introduced to it. It is 100% the best card game I’ve ever played and great I’d you like to get competitive. The game is also much faster than normal monopoly which is easier when you don’t have 5 hours to play the board game monopoly. Some people might disagree, but this game is one of the most addicting games after you learn it! You won’t be disappointed and the learning curve isn’t very difficult at all. 5-stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Christina L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect game for friends/family gathering
customer_reviews.text: I had this game before but I lost it so I bought it again. It’s a really fun game to play with friends/family/significant other! Mind you it’ll destroy relationships if you take this seriously cause this game can be really competitive and everything can change in one second 😂 I’d suggest this to people who love to use their brain a little but also hate the traditional monopoly cause it takes forever to finish one game. This game can be done within 10-15 mins! I can’t wait to play this with my friends again 😁
customer_reviews.author: Coco Chan

customer_reviews.title: This is the best family friendly card game you can play!
customer_reviews.text: This game takes all the exciting parts of Monopoly, and puts it into a card game. The game itself is easy to learn and so extremely fun to play. I played it once at a friend's house and I bought it that same night on Amazon. Since then I have played at home, other friend's houses, and on vacation when I went to Mexico. The game itself takes about two minutes to set up (simply shuffling the cards) and about 5-25 minutes to complete. It definitely can play a lot longer based on how the cards are shuffled, but that doesn't stop me from playing 3 or 4 games in a row!
customer_reviews.author: zequ;

customer_reviews.title: Get this game! So worth adding to tour collection!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. It is so much fun and super easy to learn once you know the rules, which are super simple. We play this with our eleven year old. My partner and I even play after she goes to bed.... it’s addicting!! I love that is it a combo of skill and luck and is just so much different than any other card game out there. Highly recommend. Whitney Simmons (YouTube) is the one to suggest this for me and I am glad she did... it’s honestly a super fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated (for my family) to learn initially.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this with my family. I liked the allure of a quick game, the small packaging that we could take on road trips, and the inexpensive price. However, we ended up giving this away to some friends without ever even playing the first game because the instructions were just too time consuming for us to learn and we all lost interest before we even got started :(
customer_reviews.author: Time For Lunch

customer_reviews.title: Game night fail
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this game came in a plastic wrapper, no box or anything. We finally got to sitting down and playing as a family and half way through the game we realize half the cards are missing. I'm suppose to be getting a replacement at no extra charge but I sure do hope it's the legit game. Game night fail! Thanks Hasbro😔
customer_reviews.author: Kristina R.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Original
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't like it fast? I've always dreaded playing Monopoly because of how long it can be. Don't get me wrong. The game is really fun, but it is SOOO time consuming. Monopoly Deal is perfect for me! It's much faster pace and the game is still just as fun. I definitely recommend this if you like monopoly like me but don't have the patience to monopolize things slowly. Easy to Learn 5/5 ***** For Traveling 5/5 ***** Giftable 5/5 ***** Value 5/5 ***** My Recommendation 5/5 *****
customer_reviews.author: Vuong Ly

customer_reviews.title: The Best Anywhere in the World
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my favorite card game to play. Lived in the Philippines for 2 months and played almost every day. Didn’t get old. We had as young as a 5 year old playing with us. He was very smart. Left that pack there ordered a new one when we got home. Advice: You’ll either get it right away or it’ll take you about 5-10 rounds to understand it (I was the second one). Push through your frustration! It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: No more green box
customer_reviews.text: I bought what I thought was the original green box of the game (even paid a little extra). What I got was the new blue box - AKA not the advertised game in the picture. Disappointing as I paid the exta amount for something I didn’t even end up getting.
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I know, you see a monopoly game and instantly write it off. Don’t sleep on this one. I’ve literally ordered to copies because I’m scared to death they are going to stop selling this one. This is such a fun game that I can’t believe it hasn’t gotten more attention in “gamer” circles. Very fun but maybe a little too complex for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: K Tippett

customer_reviews.title: So fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun!!! I started learning how to play games using YouTube videos - watched one video on how to play and I completely understood the rules and we picked up and started playing immediately! I’m a big monopoly fan but no one would play the original game with me because it takes so long - this is so quick and so fun! Definitely recommend and will be gifting this game During the holidays
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Need a way to play Monopoly but not have the game last hours and hours?
customer_reviews.text: This game is great! It is easy for our family to play or just me and one of my kids. We love still feeling like we are owning a property...but not having to wait for everyone to go and to buy and to pay $8 in rent until we finally have enough properties to buy a few houses. That old monopoly is just so loooong! But this monopoly deal is great fun and quick! Like only 15 minutes! My 8 year old loves playing!
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Easy game, but endless fun and every game is different!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game and it passes time by quickly. Each game only takes 15 minutes and the best part about it is the set up time is basically shuffling a deck of cards and can be played with two players. Love playing this with 4-5 people because the game is so much different than playing with just two people. The rules are so easy that even young kids can play, or friends who don't love card games. I also pack this game on long travels because it's easy to pack into a carry on and play on the airplane!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Fast and fun
customer_reviews.text: We have been playing this since Christmas. It has become a household favorite. Make sure to check the rule book and the quick start cards. There are some rules of the cards that are not in the rule book. Once you get started it really is easy to learn. We play with our 8 year old all the time. We wish you could play with more than six players.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJPWMDW4077

customer_reviews.title: Wrong version
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one specifically because it showed pictures of the previous version (I did not want the newest version because I heard a lot of bad reviews). I was disappointed to find the newest version of the game. The cards are -as I had heard- much harder to read. One of the pictures I posted shows a double rent card and you can barely see the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Best game!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best game. My husband and I play 2 on 2 and we play with 5 people as well. You can easily pick it up and win the first time you play but there is also so much strategy and luck - just like in real monopoly. A game with 2 people could last as short at 15 min or 45. Typical 30-40 minutes with 5 players. This is definitely the one to buy. The newer graphics on the other one are extremely small and hard to read. This is the best one!
customer_reviews.author: Anna C. Lukes

customer_reviews.title: So much fun you'll wear out the cards!
customer_reviews.text: I've played many, many, many, many games of Monopoly Deal. So much so that the cards are starting to show some wear and tear. I wish they were more durable. It's only tenuously related to Monopoly so there's no epic all-evening game that slogs on to an inevitable end. You *can* play all night but in 5-10 minute intervals. Easy to learn but deep strategy if you pay attention. There are a couple of scenarios that aren't covered in the rules but we've adapted house rules to cover them. (eg: Just Say No! cards count as an action for the player whose turn it is. Houses/hotels built on properties can't be used to pay other players.)
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rospo

customer_reviews.title: Regular Covid Pos Dinner Game Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We were told about this from a friend and couldn't understand how one would play Monopoly with cards, it takes a bit of focus to learn all the rules & details. Once you get it down, it is such a satisfying game to play for 3 or more players. I highly recommend this game for anyone looking for that truly GOOD new game and so easy to travel with(uh are we going anywhere) LOL. Will likley become a family favorite.
customer_reviews.author: L. Haugen

customer_reviews.title: This game is fun
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with this product. You get the actual card game monopoly in good condition. The game is easy to learn, and if you are a tactical individual you will find yourself holding back your skills to not seem like a d***. Buy this product even if you plan on having it sitting around on a shelf; you never know when people come over talking trash and need to be mentally punished in a family fun setting. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: Really fun game for our family! We have a Christmas Eve tradition of opening a new game and getting in pjs and spending family time before time for Santa to come. I wouldn’t really recommend for younger kids. Was a little tricky to learn, had to watch a YouTube video to completely understand. But, once we did, it was so much fun! It is a lot faster and a lot more cut throat lol Out of the 4 games, we bought this was the biggest hit! (Our fam ages are 12-40)
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: 6 games of monopoly on a night?! Unheard of.
customer_reviews.text: We were introduced to this game by a couple who came to visit. The first game was slow, but then they were cut throat. We played about six rounds in two hours. I even woke up the next morning demanded a rematch. Completely fun, completely addictive.
customer_reviews.author: Riley V

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews, but the condition of these Monopoly Deal games is unacceptable. I ordered 6 decks to use at an event. As you can see, one box was almost torn open at the bottom; it’s a surprise the contents didn’t empty into the shipping box: The second deck is partially wet with some kind of liquid, almost like a dish or hand soap, and has a scent that lingers. When I buy something new, I expect it to be in “new” condition.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Tippetts

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great with kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought one as a gift and one for my own family. The traditional board game is just to long on school nights (I have very young kids who go to bed early). This was perfect! We get to play monopoly as a family and it goes quickly. We also do a lot of camping and this would be perfect to take along as it doesn’t take much space. Makers should do a tin for it as well!
customer_reviews.author: 4Beavs

customer_reviews.title: Great game for vacation!
customer_reviews.text: Have played with friends before, so we bought this to bring on vacation with us. Played it just about every day... such a fun game and quick to play. The green deck cards seem a bit easier to read than the blue (which a friend has), but still sometimes difficult to tell what the colors are in low lighting (like at a bar). Would be great if the different property groups had some sort of signal to tell them apart for colors like gray vs light blue and red vs magenta.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Fun
customer_reviews.text: You already know the board game so the card game is super easy to learn. It is fun even for just 2 people. We've seen blogs and such that suggest game twists and we've come up with some of our own. Hasbro should release blank cards so that some of these ideas could be incorporated into the game. We got the game at Christmas and hubby and I usually play 3-5 games, five days a week; our adult children and grandkids always ask to play when they visit. Winning depends on luck of the draw and observant strategy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Travel Game
customer_reviews.text: This really is quick! Sometimes games can be less than 15mins, but plan on them being about 15mins on average. If I were to only keep one game (and I love board and card games) I would keep this one because it's pretty great for all ages, I haven't met one person that hasn't gotten hooked on it after trying it, it's portable, and you can spend anywhere from 15mins to hours playing it (depending on how many rounds you do). It's a great mix of strategy and luck. I cannot recommend this enough. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Andreana Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great game, not the version that's in the picture though
customer_reviews.text: Highly enjoyable game. I don't have the time or patience for actual monopoly, but this is a fun easy game to play in 15 or so minutes with friends. Game itself is 5 stars. Knocked one star off because I spent $15 on this listing to get the old version of the game which has nicer cards in my experience, ended up with the new blue box version that I could have spent $5 on with prime shipping. Sellers please update with what product you're *actually* selling.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymoos

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids AND adults!
customer_reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun, and you can very the length of play time by changing how many complete sets you need to win. My friends and I were volunteering in Baton Rouge after the floods, so there wasn't a lot to do at night, (no TV, no wifi, etc.) and we played this game every night before bed. I've also played it with my cousins who are in middle school and they enjoy it too. It's so fun! (Might not be great if you're super competitive, the game can turn around in a hurry and you can lose everything, just like real monopoly, but then the fun is trying to steal it all back!)
customer_reviews.author: Katie Howland

customer_reviews.title: Really fun game
customer_reviews.text: We love this game. Easy to learn. It is similar in concept to playing Monopoly only SO much faster. We like that it is a card game and can easily travel with us. We like that there is no board, dice, small pieces, money etc. Its just so compact, but you get the thrill of collecting (and stealing/swapping) properties similar to the traditional board game. We are fans.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Rates

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: This is a great card game. It is loosely based on the concept of the board game version of Monopoly. I prefer the card game over the board game without a doubt. I always get bored before the end of a regular Monopoly game. This card game lasts 10-15 minutes usually, so we can get a couple rounds in one session. It is pretty easy to learn, but it is challenging enough where strategy comes into play. It isn't all about luck. It is a fun game and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best Family Game EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you like Monopoly, but HATE how long it takes to finish...this game is for you! I LOVE that everyone in my family can play, from age 7 to age 59. Also, the kids learn strategy, and life skills (like don't get too proud, cuz someone may just swing in with a 'deal breaker' card and take your whole set of property...or, just keep plugging along, cuz you never know when the right cards may just swing your way!) This game can be played in just a few minutes, and it's so portable, it can be played almost anywhere! (Great for swim meets, home play, or killing time almost anywhere.)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Always loved this game, finally decided to get a set for myself. The price is reasonable and the cards are nice and study. Only bad experience I had was from the delivery. He set the cards right on the side of my door in the bush on a rainey day. And the first set I received were ruined. Good that amazon replaced for me so I have no other complaints.
customer_reviews.author: lilylu7

customer_reviews.title: good fast alternative to monopoly
customer_reviews.text: monopoly is not my favorite game, but it is one of my son's. i felt guilty because when its his turn to choose for family game night, we always veto him and make him play what we choose. figured this was a good compromise. the rules were a bit confusing at first, but made sense after we played a couple of games. it was pretty fun, and most importantly, didn't take hours to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Lbuzz

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE games and I especially love card games
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I LOVE games and I especially love card games. I've always enjoyed monopoly but it takes so long to play a round, I don't always want to play it, especially at a game night, when we want to play a few different games, monopoly just takes to long.....enter Monopoly Deal! It has a quick game play (15 min on average) but maintains the competitiveness/fun of monopoly. You can steal property from others, force trades, and fine or tax them. It's not too hard to explain or understand, so it's perfect for most ages. We played this with our friends on Sunday, and I told my husband to order it the next day! Really fun addition!
customer_reviews.author: Jen & Mike

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money we bought 3 games (2 as gifts)
customer_reviews.text: My favorite card game! I hate how long monopoly lasts, it's a game that's like pulling teeth, but this card game is quick, ~15 minutes, and is a blast. If you like strategy in a short game this is it. We purchased 1 for ourselves which a friend borrowed and never gave back, then purchased another which we gifted to family, then we finally purchased 1 last game to keep for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew George

customer_reviews.title: Great, quick game!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I play this game, and we love it. We like the monopoly theme but much faster rounds. We can usually finish a game in 10-15 minutes. We are able to play a few rounds of this instead of the much longer monopoly game play. My son is 7 and he caught on quickly. At first when I read the instructions, I was a little overwhelmed, but I took the advice on the large instruction sheet to just play and you’ll catch on. Very true. Took a round or two. Super fun game!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Addicting
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant, brilliant game. Takes a few minutes to learn and is more fun to play with others who are familiar with this game. Knowledge of the full monopoly game is not required to play this. This game is also much more fun to play with 3-5 players compared to 2 as it requires more thought and is less dependent on luck.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: HOURS OF FUN
customer_reviews.text: Monopoly Deal is so awesome! It is very easy to learn and we have a blast playing it three to four times a week. You would think we would get tired of playing it over and over, but no. It is soooo much fun. I wish the cards were a little sturdier. It seems like they are not as well made as they used to be, but my rating is based on how much fun this game is.
customer_reviews.author: DeejN

customer_reviews.title: Our families favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My husband HATES playing games.... i mean he detests them.... when i bought this as a game for us to play as a family he was for sure skeptical. After one round he was hooked, its "all about the strategy"! We love playing this game with my son and can complete a game in around 15 minutes, so multiple games on family night! We even took this to play on the plane for a long trip, and a cruise ship!
customer_reviews.author: B. McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Addicting and so much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so addicting and a blast to play!! We got it for our 8yr old for Christmas and we’ve been playing everyday multiple times a day. It takes a few games to really understand all the rules but it doesn’t take too long and before you know it everyone has caught on and you’re having a blast!! I would recommend this game to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Quick!
customer_reviews.text: The one thing horrible about regular Monopoly to me is the length of time it takes to finish a game. I don't remember a time where I haven't just given up and gave everything away just to get it over quicker. I love how quick it is to play as keeps even my attention span although it does take a bit to learn the new rules.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great game if looking for something new
customer_reviews.text: If you love card games but miss playing an occasional board game, you will love Monopoly Deal. We watched a how to video on YouTube as the instructions left us with a few questions. The game is fast pace, challenging, and quite fun. You get the feel of a card game combined with rental fees, property purchases, and even hotel rates. Challenging and fun for two players, a large group is not necessary. Definitely a game to add to your collection.
customer_reviews.author: CBaker

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC Game. FAST Paced. LOADS of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game. If you like monopoly and fast card games, you will love Monopoly DEAL! It's fast paced, fun, and best of all, it doesn't take hours to finish. You can finish a round within maybe 30 minutes if the cards fall in your favor. A must have for monopoly lovers! If my review helped you, please click LIKE OR HELPED. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Executive Director of WindowsHD

customer_reviews.title: fun-give it a chance!
customer_reviews.text: A very fun, competitive and quick game. I think it's best with 3 or 4 people. I would definitely recommend watching the video on YouTube on how to play, first. It seems confusing, but after several turns, it starts making more sense. Once you play a full second game, you will be comfortable. I've played with people raging in ages from 12-60 and everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: False Advertise.  Shipped Cheaper Version
customer_reviews.text: Seller advertised one version, but shipped a cheaper reproduction. The picture shows green box and better cards, which is better version. Paid for that one, but was shipped a cheap set that actually sells for half the price
customer_reviews.author: Tim L Boone

customer_reviews.title: Like Uno & monopoly? You'll LOVE this game!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game, it's Monopoly strategy with the speed and playing style of UNO. You can teach a group by playing the first round with "open face cards" to show your hand and everybody easily picks up on the strategy. If players remember how to play Monopoly (especially that railroads are 4 and certain properties only take 2 for a monopoly) and they've play uno in the past, they pick it up really quickly. 2 player games can take between 5-15mins; larger games can take 10-25 depending on how familiar the players are with the game.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian G

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS PICTURED. They sent the blue box
customer_reviews.text: Did not get the green box. The new version ( blue box) is not fun to try to play. I spent more $$ specifically for the original (green box) but did not get it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: A buyer

customer_reviews.title: Fun little game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11-year-old son’s birthday. We love to play games and like quick, easy card games for times we don’t want to pull a whole game out. This game was surprisingly more fun than expected. The game itself doesn’t last as long as real Monopoly (thankfully...LOL) but, depending on how you play your hands, can go very quickly or last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Great for just two players, or more. I like it for a few reasons. It stays pretty true to monopoly, but it's a lot quicker, so you're not sucked into an hours long monopoly game. If you want to play longer, just deal another hand. Second, there's actually a good bit of strategy involved. So I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: p. annoyed

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, I made sure all the cards were present before giving this to my niece as a gift. The item was perfect. We tried to figure out the rules before playing but it seemed so confusing. The rules actually say “just start playing” and they are right! It makes sense as you play, and if you end up with a question, just consult the rules or make it up for yourself. We had so much fun with this!!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TrainerDi

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this game!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for my son for Christmas, to get me out of playing the board game version of Monopoly which lasts forever (and I always seem to lose). This is a quick version but overall same concepts, and it's fun to play. Plus I've actually beaten him a few times, which is a plus (but really comes down to luck of the draw along with some strategy on what to play when). It's now March and I can't count the number of games he's played with this deck with various members of the family and friends. I am so glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Go-To Filler
customer_reviews.text: Easy to teach. Fast gameplay. Super portable. Nobody ever says "no" to round. I've played more hours of Monopoly Deal than any other game I own because it is so easy to bring to the table. People in the know know and those that are new recognize the Monopoly branding and "get it" within a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rutgers Student

customer_reviews.title: BEST. PURCHASE. EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best game ever!! Hubby and I love games..but there are somewhat slim pickings when it comes to two player games. This game changes everything. We play it so often - on dates while we’re waiting for our food, at night after the kids have gone to bed, and with friends when we all meet up. It’s the perfect blend of strategy and luck. && the time it takes the whole game is about 20 minutes. Every friend that has played with us ended up buying it too. I can’t say enough about how great & fun this game is!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite card game when I don't have a lot of time to play
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite card game when I am a little short on time, but still want to squeeze in some fun. Easy to learn, quality construction, and great replayability. My 11 and 13 year old request this game all the time and it's been a wonderful way to connect with them when they don't really want to sit down to chat.
customer_reviews.author: thewavebb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: love the game, I bought it to play with my girlfriend (who has yet to win😉). That being said it was super easy to pick up the roads are faster so you don't have to worry about getting roped into a 3-hour monopoly battle. That being said the fun of the game can last for as long as you'd like. It works really well with the two of us and we played it with two other friends as well and it was seamless. It's super portable slightly larger than a deck of cards. overall we love it and recommend!!!!👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fun, quick, unpredictable winner, & easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: This is a great easy game that everyone can enjoy. The game play can be fast and is completely by predictable! Make a great gift too! FYI... this older verision is MUCH BETTER than the newer. It is easier to read and see your hand. I won’t buy the newer looking cards. It also make s a great gift. When visiting friends we will often bring 2 sets of cards (an unopened new deck). After playing the game we leave the unopened deck of cards with the host to continue the fun with others. That’s why I bought 6 sets!
customer_reviews.author: Joxer the Mighty

customer_reviews.title: Yes...you can even build that Monopoly Hate on a trip, without losing small pieces
customer_reviews.text: It's a great card game, easy to play, fun, and the game doesn't take as long as the regular game itself. You can be ruthless, and really make your 10 year old niece or nephew cry, and then tell them to go sit with their crying parent, who you eliminated as well! It's fantastic. Establish that dominance, and let your family know that you are the Alpha, and they are just all pawns in your game!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P. YBarra

customer_reviews.title: I Finally want to play monopoly!
customer_reviews.text: As a kid I enjoyed playing monopoly - especially those games that would take days to finish, but now it’s not as exciting so this quick card game version is perfect for when my son asks to play monopoly! I just wish the monetary dollar values were a little more realistic so he could learn about money in a way that is more accessible. Good gift to add on or give as part of a small goodie bag.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Better than the board game
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like about this game?!?! My sister introduced it to my family one day we were hanging out. I no longer play the monopoly board game because I find this one more interesting, more fun and it’s only equally time consuming because we want to keep playing so many rounds! Otherwise, each game takes approximately 15-20 min per round. Now most of my siblings own a deck, as well as my parents. We always play when we get together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun once you understand it! It took us a few rounds before we truly understood all the rules and what it entailed. Husband and I were searching for 2 player games during the quarantine and this is an excellent choice! It was recommended to us by a blogger I follow. Very glad we listened!
customer_reviews.author: MLJohnston48

customer_reviews.title: Favorite party game!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game!! Its a little hard in the beginning to understand the strategy of the game but once you and everyone understands, the game is super fun. It can get super competitive!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: What a great game!  Easy to learn & fairly quick to play.
customer_reviews.text: Our kids (adults) come for dinner once a week & we usually play cards or dominoes. I bought this game & we all love it. The first game took a while as we figured out the rules, but after that the play was quick & fun. We can play 3 or 4 games in an hour while chatting about the week. Just super.
customer_reviews.author: James S. MacLachlan

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy Monopoly Deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game... Just like real Monopoly, but without the hassle of setting up the board game, giving out the money and being a banker. The game is short giving you the option to play several rounds. Super easy to learn. The more people that play, the more fun you will have. Also, the game can get super competitive, so hopefully you can compete! :)
customer_reviews.author: JerseySaltLife

customer_reviews.title: quick fun game
customer_reviews.text: We often play a quick 10 minute game and then another. It goes pretty quick so we made up a rule that we needed 5 sets of properties to win. That keeps things a bit longer and less lope sided. If you get the card that makes you able to still a whole set of properties then you will pretty much win with the 3 set rule.
customer_reviews.author: stever

customer_reviews.title: very hard to follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: I read the instructions yet, had to follow some youtube channels to understand how to play this game. When I was trying to explain the rules, half of my friends fell asleep. I understand that I need more game nights to make them like this game. I like the game, it was cool but I think I have dumb/sleepy friends lol
customer_reviews.author: perksofbeautyblog

customer_reviews.title: Great family game! Fast paced, simple, interesting!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic game - it's one of the few that's really fun regardless of whether you're playing with 2 people, 3 people, or 5 people. It continues to be interesting and fast paced regardless of the number of players (which isn't the case for most card games, which are optimized for a particular number of players). The fact that game play is so fast (it takes about 10 minutes with two players, 20 with 5) makes the game super addictive. This also makes it great for killing awkward chunks of time in the middle of your day/evening (20-30 mins).
customer_reviews.author: Sonya  Kotov

customer_reviews.title: Best monopoly card game ever!
customer_reviews.text: First off I grew up playing monopoly and we loved it as kids. We spent HOURS playing (the main reason I don’t play any more). However this fun card game literally take 15-20 mins a game. It is fun and packs easy; so great for travel! The only downside is the instructions are a little hard to understand by just reading them my advice would be to play a hand open first. The more you play the easier the rules become. Also there are a few rules not included in the instructions if this happens hopefully Everton can agree what to do in those off predicaments. For us we went to google!!! Happy playing!
customer_reviews.author: Crelicious18

customer_reviews.title: Fun and fast version of Monopoly
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of minutes to learn, but after that is was fun and fast. Really enjoy it - in fact, we played long after someone actually won, because it went by so quickly. Fun to have this option while we’re at home! The actual board game is fun, but WAY too long - this is a nice alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Tery D.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable game and very easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: A fun and easy to learn variation of the Monopoly game. What's neat is that you can get a decent game in about 10-15 minutes, instead of the soul-draining hours that regular Monopoly can take to play. The game doesn't take long to get started with and there are a number of strategies that you can learn against the other players. Cards can quickly change the scope of the game and the tables turned on a player who is winning. It's a lot of fun and even younger players can get into it. One note about the description: there's a "CHOKING HAZARD -- Small parts" warning which is odd, as this is basically just a deck of colorful cards.
customer_reviews.author: Inquisitive Guereza

customer_reviews.title: A great card game to replace the regular monopoly
customer_reviews.text: I am often resisting to play the regular Monopoly because of how long it can possibly get (the longest I have ever played was 3 hours). This card game offers the same concept as a regular Monopoly but can actually finish the game in 10-20 mins. After playing this, I don't ever look back playing the regular Monopoly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Best Monopoly game out there!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves Monopoly Deal because it cuts straight to the violence! You can't get too attached to any money or properties because you know, in all likelihood, that it will exchange hands several times. Each game is quick, so you can play several at a sitting. It comes with us whenever we travel. We teach it to everyone we know and make sure they get their own deck as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amy E.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy to learn. Even if you don’t like the board game version!
customer_reviews.text: I hate monopoly but was introduced to this card game version- and it was actually extremely fun and easy to pick up (that said, I still haven’t won a game). Lots of different strategies you can try out to win, from what I’ve gathered from the people that beat me. Definitely some luck in the cards you draw but you can outwit opponents. A few things missing in the rules, some ambiguities but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sajeena

customer_reviews.title: My Coworkers LOVE This Game!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got a deck of my own, because whenever we had downtime at work, there would always be a search for someone in the office who has this game. It's quick enough to whip out at any time, but long enough that it's entertaining. It has all the competitiveness of regular Monopoly, and tides can change wildly at any time. You can be sooooo close to winning and suddenly have nothing! We all love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Seneca

product_meta.title: Monopoly Deal Card Game
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingGet a handy way to play the classic property-trading game! Be the first collect 3 full property sets of different colors, and you'll win the Monopoly deal card game. You'll pick up cards when it's your turn and play action cards to charge players rent, steal their cards or demand money for your birthday. Build up property sets, gather piles of money and keep wheeling and dealing until you're the Monopoly deal winner! 

monopoly and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The fast-paced, addictive card game where your luck can change in the play of a card! Collect 3 complete property sets, but beware of Debt collectors, Forced Deals and the dreaded Deal Breakers, which could change your fortunes at any time! Fun version of Monopoly for ages 8 and up!
feature_bullets: New Monopoly Deal card game that is moving through Family Game Nights everywhere
Collect 3 complete property sets but beware of the Debt Collectors, Forced Deals and Deal Breakers
If you are looking for a fun family/friend game, this is it
Now only plays up to five players which takes apprx 45 min to play w/5 people, apprx 35 min w/4, apprx 15-25 minutes w/3 people and apprx 5-15 minutes w/2 people

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars10,281 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
